name: Chaos on the Battlefield
description:
Controls: Just the mouse, left click to select characters, move and attack.

This is a demo made for the GMTK 2020 game jam for the theme "Out Of Control"

My inspiration was the idea that you could have a turn based strategy game where you could only control a portion of your units each turn, and that the ones you did not control would instead move of their own accord. 

Unfortunately I have run into a few very bad bugs and I do not think they will be resolved by the time the deadline comes around, so enjoy this small demo instead!

You get two moves before everyone moves! 

Assets used:

Sound Effects from 8-BIT SFX pack by Beep Yeah!
https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-back

Many art assets from HUGE pixelart asset pack by S4m-ur4i

https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/huge-pixelart-asset-pack 

Font from Humble Fonts Gold by somepx

https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold 

Everything else by me!

Written in the Godot engine

https://godotengine.org/
